name: Eternal Drift
description:
Race through four engaging courses in the only racing game without a maximum speed. That's right, you can drive as fast as you want, if you have the skills to drift through narrow corners at ludicrously fast speeds. The more you drift the faster you'll go. The faster you go the more you get to drift. 

Controls: 

A/D: steer left/right

 S: brake 

SPACE: accelerate 

P: Drift
